1253550.name: VEGAS Movie Studio 17 Steam Edition
1253550.description:
Are you look for an easy-to-use video editing software for your next YouTube video, Let's Play, meme or vlog? The search is over with VEGAS Movie Studio 17 Steam Edition! The new "Guided Video Creator" allows you to create videos in just five steps. Or use Power User Mode to access all of the software's power and features: Cut events on the timeline and apply texts, title animations, transition and special effects.

The perfect introduction to the world of video production: As a part of the VEGAS product family, VEGAS Movie Studio is based on the same technology as the fastest and most versatile video editing software on the market.

Highlights

  • Intuitive editing modes for quick & easy videos
  • New, comprehensive support for Nvidia & AMD GPUs while previewing video and rendering
  • Thanks to the new "Guided Video Creator", create a video in just 5 steps
  • New Black Bar Fill Filter, which replaces black bars from smartphone videos with a blurred copy of your video material
  • Tons of video effects and transitions – displayed in a clear interface
  • Modern typography templates for title animations
  • Powerful picture-in-picture editing
  • Expanded audio editing with power audio tools and high-quality audio

Video and audio production

Innovative features for intuitive editing
Who says that video editing has to be complicated? VEGAS Movie Studio 17 Steam Edition make editing your videos simple. Edit, retouch and organize photos and videos easily. Apply impressive special effects, fun text and your favorite music. Watch your gameplays natively in Full-HD resolution and upload the results directly to your channel. Or share them with your friends and on your channel's subscribers.

Share your videos

When you're finished, you can upload your videos directly to Facebook, YouTube, and Vimeo. VEGAS Movie Studio 17 Steam Edition automatically selects the best format for the desired platform and uploads them for you. So what are you waiting for? Share your videos with the entire world!
1253550.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 波兰语
